## TokenRequiredAnswersConfig interface

Configuration options for [AnswersCore](./answers-core.answerscore.md)<!-- -->, following [BaseAnswersConfig](./answers-core.baseanswersconfig.md)<!-- -->, but requires token.

<b>Signature:</b>

